attributes.action: save our crown on the pint glass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is this fair land coming to when we have to take the crown off our pint glass. We are slowly losing our identity to Europe. What is it going to be replaced with a circle of blue stars.We should be proud of what we are, and i don't see myself as EUROPEAN. SO EUROPE LEAVE OUR PINT ALONE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
